query.q: owl_subclass_of(T, knowrob:'StorageConstruct'), class_properties(T, knowrob:'typePrimaryFunction-StoragePlaceFor', knowrob:'Perishable'), owl_individual_of(Obj, T), highlight_object_with_children(Obj).
query.text: What is the storage place for perishable items?
----- Queries on the logged belief state -----

query.q: task_goal(Rolling, 'REPLACEABLE-FUNCTION-ROLL-OBJECT'), rdf_has(Rolling, knowrob:'startTime', T), add_agent_visualization('BOXY', boxy:'boxy_robot2', T, '', '').

task_goal(PostAction, 'REPLACEABLE-FUNCTION-ROLL-OBJECT'), rdf_has(PostAction, knowrob:'previousAction', PreAction), designator_between(Designator, PreAction, PostAction), add_designator_contour_mesh('Foo', Designator, [0.0,0.0,0.0], ['DOUGH', 'CONTOUR']).
